import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import AccomCard from './AccomCard.js' import ActCard from './ActCard.js' import FlightCard from './FlightCard.js' import ActCRUD from './ActCRUD.js' import FlightCRUD from './FlightCRUD.js' import CollabCard from './CollabCard.js' import AddCollab from './AddCollab.js' import ExpenseCard from './ExpenseCard.js' import ExpenseCRUD from './ExpenseCRUD.js' import NewAccom from './NewAccom.js' import { Button, Card, Grid } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class EventCard extends Component { render() { const collabMap = this.props.collaborators.map(collaborator=> ) const col1 = [] for (let i = 0; i < collabMap.length; i+=4) { col1.push(collabMap[i]) } return (
{this.props.name}
{this.props.date}
{this.props.location}


{/* COLLABORATORS */}
Collaborators
{this.props.collaborators.map(collaborator=> )}
) } }
